sourcesContent:
<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-title>
      Cambiar password
    </ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content class="ion-padding">
  <ion-item>
    <ion-label position="stacked">Correo Electrónico</ion-label>
    <ion-input type="email" [(ngModel)]="userEmail" disabled></ion-input>
  </ion-item>

  <ion-item>
    <ion-label position="stacked">Nueva Contraseña</ion-label>
    <ion-input type="password" [(ngModel)]="newPassword"></ion-input>
  </ion-item>

  <ion-button expand="full" (click)="changePassword()">Cambiar Contraseña</ion-button>
</ion-content>
